entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is introduced as Bill's mother and Harry's host. She is described as swooping down upon Harry to kiss him again.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as being married to Mrs Weasley and working very hard at the moment.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as one of the people who are avoiding each other's gaze with Mrs Weasley and Ginny.

entities.name: gi nny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being part of the group that is avoiding each other's gaze with Mrs Weasley and Hermione.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is introduced as a place where Mrs Weasley works part-time for her English.

relationships.description: Mrs Weasley and Bill are mentioned as being married.
Gringotts is introduced as Mrs Weasley's employer where she works part-time for her English.
